name: Twist of Destiny
description: Twist of Destiny is an exciting turn-based RPG where you lead a team of up to 4 characters around the world in dangerous adventures! Experience the astonishing art & animations in the world of TOD.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2296 MB available space
